title: Southern California Clinical and Translational Science Institute
description: USC's Clinical Trial Management System, OnCore, is a free, web-based platform uniquely designed for streamlined management of clinical trials, offering researchers early access to treatment options and contributing to advancements in cancer and other disease research.

title: Translational Medicine Group
description: A secure and cost-effective clinical trial management system offering rapid setup and a web-based portal tailored for small to medium-sized trials, developed by the Research Informatics Core at MGH's Center for Systems Biology.
